author: elecharny
msg: o Removed the createInstance() methods used to create BTree instances, replaced with plain constructors. This allow the user to define generic BTrees easily
o As the Tuple is now generic, modify the using code accordingly
o the BTree.load() method is not anymore static, for the same reason than #1 : generics don't like static methods.
